column6:
The mystery behind Kitty's trip to far-off Japan deepens when she is attacked by a whole mess of ninjas! What do these ninjas want with Kitty? And what long-forgotten villain from Kitty's past is about to finally make his move? Part 2 (of 6). ,2005,7
32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Paul Smith | colorist:Christina Strain | writer:Akira Yoshida
